name: Yadola
caption:
Happy Birthday Sennn >.< !!
 Surprisee 💅
Thought I would do something this year

This auto moves every 20 seconds! You can click on the tiny thumbnails to go to that 'wish'

name: Kinphyre
caption:
Happy birthday, Sen!
You're amazing, an inspiration and a friend. I love your imagination, your humor and your gentleness.
You deserve so much in this life, and I look forward to accompanying you on this journey! ❤️

name: Amy
caption: Happy Bday to my fav Chiloomfie! ☆

name: Ela
caption:
Happiest of birthdays to you, Sen!
I wish you nothing but good food, lots of Childe, and fantastic luck on your special day 🥹 enjoy it, you deserve everything, girlie! 💖

name: Viktor
caption: Happy Birthday Akka! Pls buy me food I'm broke xD

name: Kittah
caption:
Happy birthday Sen ! 💖
I heard about your birthday and well…I had to join in on this collage for you. I know I haven't drawn for like a year and a half but I had to muster all I can for this. Tbh, I messed up with what I was initially doing and was running out of time, so I still hope this rushed one will be good enough.
Putting all that aside, thank you for being an amazing person and I'm glad to have met you through chilumi. Starting just as a moot, then a client, and now friends. I hope for our friendships, like many we have met through the community we love so much, continues to last for the unforseeable future.
I hope you have a great birthday and always remember to stay well, healthy, and hydrated!
With love from the lazy, goofy, dorky panda-wolfy!

name: Champsissy
caption:
Happy Birthday Sen!
You are such a blessing to our community and I look forward to every new art piece you deliver. Thank you for inspiring me with your love of chilumi and your incredible artwork!
Hope you have a fantastic day and a wonderful year ahead! 💕

name: Fiamma
caption:
Sennnn!!
I just wanted to wish you a happy birthday! I'm awful with words, but I'm glad to have met you. You've been so sweet every time I comm you, and I always love seeing your posts on my Timeline♡
I hope your day is wonderful and you have a lot of fun. Happy Birthday!!! ♡♡
